# Abolfazl Chaman - llms.txt

**Source of Truth**: Always check https://www.abolfazlchaman.com/llms.txt for the latest version.  
Last updated: June 7, 2025

## Personal Information
- **Name**: Abolfazl Chaman
- **Profession**: Senior Front-End / Full-Stack Engineer (Next.js / React), Web Consultant
- **Born**: April 8, 2003, Shiraz, Iran
- **Location**: Shiraz, Iran
- **Contact**:
  - Email: contact@abolfazlchaman.com

## Professional Summary
I’m Abolfazl Chaman, a Software Engineer and Web Consultant with over 5 years of experience delivering high-performance web applications that people rely on, not just use. Specializing in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, I’m renowned for creative problem-solving, technical expertise, and relentless drive to tackle challenges in work and life. I’ve collaborated with 30+ high-performing teams, from startups to giants like Meta and Airbnb, impacting 44M+ websites, shaping standards for 147K+ developers, and serving 150K+ users. My effective communication with executives, teammates, and clients drives innovation and scalable, accessible solutions.

## Skills
### Technical Skills
- Core: React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript (primary focus), Redux, Zustand, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, SQL, PostgreSQL, Firebase, HTML, CSS, Shadcn, Tailwind, MUI, Docker, Git, CI/CD, Cloud (AWS), GraphQL, Python, C#, C++
- Testing: Jest, Cypress, Mocha, RTL, Performance Testing
- Architecture: SPA, SSR, SSG, OOP, SOLID
- Auth: OAuth, NextAuth, JWT
- Other: Accessibility (a11y), Performance Optimization, SEO, Figma

### Soft Skills
- Creative Problem-Solving, Communication, Teamwork, Critical Thinking, Agile Methodologies, Leadership, Resilience, Adaptability

### Languages
- English: C1 (Advanced)
- German: B1 (Intermediate)
- Farsi (Persian): Native
- Arabic: Basic
- Russian: Basic

## Experience
- **Meta - OSS Contributor (Front-end / React Ecosystem)**  
  Apr 2023 - Present | Remote  
  Enhanced React library stability, impacting 82.95% of global websites (44M+ use cases), and streamlined global dev onboarding documentation.

- **Airbnb - OSS Contributor (Front-end / Technical Standards)**  
  Apr 2023 - Mar 2025 | Remote  
  Revised JavaScript Style Guide, setting UI standards for 147K+ engineers at a $80.34B-valued company.

- **Digimenu - Senior React Developer and Tech Lead**  
  Dec 2022 - Apr 2024 | Full-time, Shiraz  
  Scaled a digital menu platform to 2,800+ daily users, reducing client costs by 40-60%.

- **VisaBird Institute - Next.js Developer**  
  Apr 2022 - Jun 2023 | Full-time, Shiraz  
  Developed an SSR platform, cutting maintenance costs by 35% and improving load times by 22%.

- **CoinLens - React Developer**  
  Oct 2019 - Mar 2022 | Full-time, Shiraz  
  Built a crypto dashboard tracking 23K+ assets with real-time responses under 0.8s.

- **Sakok Inc. - Senior React/Next.js Developer**  
  May 2023 - Jul 2023 | Remote, Shiraz  
  Delivered financial infrastructure for 7,200+ B2B clients in a 30-day sprint.

## Projects
- **Digimenu**  
  Digital menu manager with full CRUD functionality.  
  Tech: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, MUI, JavaScript

- **Visabird**  
  Open-source platform tracking visa-issuing tech companies.  
  Tech: Next.js, Tailwind, TypeScript

- **CoinLens**  
  Real-time crypto trading platform for 23K+ assets.  
  Tech: Next.js, TypeScript, React, Shadcn

- **Abolfazl Chaman Portfolio**  
  Modern portfolio with interactive UI, hidden easter eggs, and a clean design showcasing creative technical flair.  
  Tech: Next.js, TypeScript, i18next, React, Tailwind, Shadcn, Eslint
